method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _barchartlegend
method.comment: Specifies the legend text style. Position: Possible values: Top, Bottom, Left, Right, In, None. TextColor: Color of the legend text. FontName: Name of the selected font. FontSize: Size of the selected font. Bold: True or False. Italic: True or False.

method.name: _barchartsetcolumnvalues
method.comment: Description of every value.

method.name: _barchartsethorizontalaxistitle
method.comment: Specifies the title of the horizontal axis.

method.name: _barchartsetverticalaxistitle
method.comment: Specifies the title of the vertical axis.

method.name: _barcharttitlestyle
method.comment: Specifies the bar text style.

method.name: _bubblechartlegend
method.comment: Specifies the legend text style. Position: Possible values: Top, Bottom, Left, Right, In, None. TextColor: Color of the legend text. FontName: Name of the selected font. FontSize: Size of the selected font. Bold: True or False. Italic: True or False.

method.name: _bubblechartsetbubblestyle
method.comment: Colors to assign to the bubbles.

method.name: _bubblechartsetcolumnvalues
method.comment: Column values.

method.name: _bubblechartsethorizontalaxistitle
method.comment: Specifies the title of the horizontal axis.

method.name: _bubblechartsetverticalaxistitle
method.comment: Specifies the title of the vertical axis.

method.name: _bubblecharttitlestyle
method.comment: Specifies the slice text style.

method.name: _chartdefaultbackground
method.comment: Set the default background for the whole chart. StrokeColor: The color of the chart border. StrokeWidth: The border width. FillColor: The background color for the main area of the chart.

method.name: _combochartcreateseries
method.comment: Create a specific data representation. ColumnLabel: The name of the column to use. SeriesType: Possible values: Line, Area, Bars, SteppedArea. CurveType: None, Funtion. (Just for Line series type). VisibleInLegend: Show the Column name in the chart's legend.

method.name: _combochartcrosshair
method.comment: Trigger: Possible values: Both, Focus, Selection. Orientation: Possible values: Both, Horizontal, Vertical.

method.name: _combochartlegend
method.comment: Specifies the legend text style. Position: Possible values: Top, Bottom, Left, Right, In, None. TextColor: Color of the legend text. FontName: Name of the selected font. FontSize: Size of the selected font. Bold: True or False. Italic: True or False.

method.name: _combochartsetcolumnvalues
method.comment: Column values.

method.name: _combochartsethorizontalaxistitle
method.comment: Specifies the title of the horizontal axis.

method.name: _combochartsetverticalaxistitle
method.comment: Specifies the title of the vertical axis.

method.name: _combocharttitlestyle
method.comment: Specifies the slice text style.

method.name: _geochartlegend
method.comment: Specifies the legend text style. Position: Possible values: Top, Bottom, Left, Right, Labeled, None. TextColor: Color of the legend text. FontName: Name of the selected font. FontSize: Size of the selected font. Bold: True or False. Italic: True or False.

method.name: _geochartsetcolumnvalues
method.comment: Description of every column and their respective value.

method.name: _histogramchartlegend
method.comment: Specifies the legend text style. Position: Possible values: Top, Bottom, Left, Right, In, None. TextColor: Color of the legend text. FontName: Name of the selected font. FontSize: Size of the selected font. Bold: True or False. Italic: True or False.

method.name: _histogramchartsetcolumnvalues
method.comment: Column values. Set: Row index.

method.name: _histogramchartsethorizontalaxistitle
method.comment: Specifies the title of the horizontal axis.

method.name: _histogramchartsetverticalaxistitle
method.comment: Specifies the title of the vertical axis.

method.name: _histogramcharttitlestyle
method.comment: Specifies the histogram text style.

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the GoogleCharts library. Parent: Activity or Panel where the GoogleCharts will be added to. Module: Me (Required). EventName: Prefix to be used on the event responses. ShowMenuButton: Display a menu button on the chart.

method.name: _piechartlegend
method.comment: Specifies the legend text style. Position: Possible values: Top, Bottom, Left, Right, Labeled, None. TextColor: Color of the legend text. FontName: Name of the selected font. FontSize: Size of the selected font. Bold: True or False. Italic: True or False.

method.name: _piechartsetsliceoffset
method.comment: Set the margin of separation for the selected slice. SliceLabel: The selected slice to separate. Offset: Amount of separation, from 0 through 9.

method.name: _piechartslicelabelandvalue
method.comment: Description of every slice on the chart.

method.name: _piechartslicetextstyle
method.comment: Specifies the slice text style.

method.name: _piecharttitlestyle
method.comment: Specifies the slice text style.

method.name: _printchart
method.comment: Print the selected chart via CloudPrint.

method.name: _savechart
method.comment: Save the selected chart.

method.name: _scatterchartcrosshair
method.comment: Trigger: Possible values: Both, Focus, Selection. Orientation: Possible values: Both, Horizontal, Vertical.

method.name: _scatterchartlegend
method.comment: Specifies the legend text style. Position: Possible values: Top, Bottom, Left, Right, In, None. TextColor: Color of the legend text. FontName: Name of the selected font. FontSize: Size of the selected font. Bold: True or False. Italic: True or False.

method.name: _scatterchartpointshape
method.comment: The shape of individual data elements. Shape: Possible values: Circle, Triangle, Square, Diamond, Star, Polygon.

method.name: _scatterchartsetcolumnvalues
method.comment: Description of every column and their respective value.

method.name: _scatterchartsethorizontalaxistitle
method.comment: Specifies the title of the horizontal axis.

method.name: _scatterchartsetverticalaxistitle
method.comment: Specifies the title of the vertical axis.

method.name: _scatterchartshowtrendline
method.comment: Displays a trendline on the chart. ColumnLabel: The name of the column. LabelInLegend: The text to show describing the trendline. TrendLineType: Possible values: Linear, Polynomial, Exponential. Degree: The degree of the polynomial (2 for quadratic, 3 for cubic, and so on). LineWidth: The line width of the trendline, in pixels. PointSize: Size of the dot. ShowLabelInLegend: Show the text discribing the trendline on the legend.

method.name: _scattercharttitlestyle
method.comment: Specifies the Scatter Chart text style.

method.name: _setaddofflinecustomfonttochart
method.comment: Add a font from your assets directory.

method.name: _setaddonlinecustomfonttochart
method.comment: Add a font from Google Fonts. FontName: Name of the selected font, CASE SENSITIVE.

method.name: _setbarchartbarscolor
method.comment: Colors to assign to each bar.

method.name: _setbarchartisstacked
method.comment: Stacks the elements in a series.

method.name: _setbarchartorientation
method.comment: The orientation of the chart. Orientation: Posible values: Horizontal, Vertical.

method.name: _setbarchartreversecategories
method.comment: If set to true, will draw series from right to left.

method.name: _setbarchartsetaxistitlesposition
method.comment: Position of the horizontal and vertical axis text, relative to the chart area. Position: Possible values: In, Out, None.

method.name: _setbarchartsetcolumnlabel
method.comment: Description of every column on the chart.

method.name: _setbarchartshowcolumnlabel
method.comment: Display the value of the column.

method.name: _setbarcharttitle
method.comment: Text to display above the chart.

method.name: _setbubblechartlegendcoloraxis
method.comment: Colors to assign to values in the visualization.

method.name: _setbubblechartreversecategories
method.comment: If set to true, will draw series from right to left.

method.name: _setbubblechartseriescolor
method.comment: Colors to assign to each object.

method.name: _setbubblechartsetaxistitlesposition
method.comment: Position of the horizontal and vertical axis text, relative to the chart area. Position: Possible values: In, Out, None.

method.name: _setbubblechartsetcolumnlabel
method.comment: Description of every column on the chart.

method.name: _setbubblecharttitle
method.comment: Text to display above the chart.

method.name: _setchartdefaultfontname
method.comment: Set the default font for the whole chart.

method.name: _setchartdefaultfontsize
method.comment: Set the default font size for the whole chart.

method.name: _setcombochartdefaultcurvetype
method.comment: Set the default way to draw lines. CurveType: None, Function.

method.name: _setcombochartisstacked
method.comment: Stacks the elements in a series.

method.name: _setcombochartorientation
method.comment: The orientation of the chart. Orientation: Posible values: Horizontal, Vertical.

method.name: _setcombochartreversecategories
method.comment: If set to true, will draw series from right to left.

method.name: _setcombochartseriescolor
method.comment: Colors to assign to each object.

method.name: _setcombochartsetaxistitlesposition
method.comment: Position of the horizontal and vertical axis text, relative to the chart area. Position: Possible values: In, Out, None.

method.name: _setcombochartsetcolumnlabel
method.comment: Description of every column on the chart.

method.name: _setcombochartsetdefaultseriestype
method.comment: Sets the default type to represent data on a Combo Chart. SeriesType: Possible values: Line, Area, Bars, SteppedArea.

method.name: _setcombocharttitle
method.comment: Text to display above the chart.

method.name: _setgeochartdisplaymode
method.comment: Which type of geochart this is. Mode: Possible values: Auto, Regions, Markers, Text.

method.name: _setgeochartlegendcoloraxis
method.comment: Colors to assign to values in the visualization.

method.name: _setgeochartsetcolumnlabel
method.comment: Description of every column on the chart.

method.name: _setgeochartsetdatalesscolor
method.comment: Color to assign to regions with no associated data.

method.name: _setgeochartsetregion
method.comment: The area to display on the geochart. Region: Possible values: World, A continent or a sub-continent, specified by its 3-digit code. A country, specified by its ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code. A state In the United States, specified by its ISO 3166-2:US code.

method.name: _setgeochartsetresolution
method.comment: The resolution of the geochart borders. Resolution: Possible values: Countries, Provinces, Metros (US only).

method.name: _sethistogramchartisstacked
method.comment: Stacks the elements in a series.

method.name: _sethistogramchartorientation
method.comment: The orientation of the chart. Orientation: Posible values: Horizontal, Vertical.

method.name: _sethistogramchartreversecategories
method.comment: If set to true, will draw series from right to left.

method.name: _sethistogramchartseriescolor
method.comment: Colors to assign to each column.

method.name: _sethistogramchartsetaxistitlesposition
method.comment: Position of the horizontal and vertical axis text, relative to the chart area. Position: Possible values: In, Out, None.

method.name: _sethistogramchartsetcolumnlabel
method.comment: Description of every column on the chart.

method.name: _sethistogramcharttitle
method.comment: Text to display above the chart.

method.name: _setpiechart3d
method.comment: Displays a three-dimensional pie chart.

method.name: _setpiechartpiehole
method.comment: Display a donut chart. Size: From 1 through 9. The hole will have a radius equal to number times the radius of the chart.

method.name: _setpiechartreversecategories
method.comment: If true, draws slices counterclockwise. The default is to draw clockwise.

method.name: _setpiechartslicebordercolor
method.comment: Sets the color for the slices' border.

method.name: _setpiechartslicescolor
method.comment: Colors to assign to each slice.

method.name: _setpiechartslicetext
method.comment: The content of the text displayed on the slice. Text: Possible values: Percentage, Value, Label, None.

method.name: _setpiechartstartangle
method.comment: Set the angle in degrees to rotate the chart by. The default of 0 will orient the leftmost edge of the first slice directly up.

method.name: _setpiecharttitle
method.comment: Text to display above the chart.

method.name: _setscatterchartdotscolor
method.comment: Colors to assign to each dot.

method.name: _setscatterchartreversecategories
method.comment: If true, draws the dots counterclockwise. The default is to draw clockwise.

method.name: _setscatterchartsetaxistitlesposition
method.comment: Position of the horizontal and vertical axis text, relative to the chart area. Position: Possible values: In, Out, None.

method.name: _setscattercharttitle
method.comment: Text to display above the chart.

method.name: _showbarchart
method.comment: Generate and display the Bar Chart.

method.name: _showbubblechart
method.comment: Generate and display the Combo Chart.

method.name: _showcombochart
method.comment: Generate and display the Combo Chart.

method.name: _showgeochart
method.comment: Generate and display the Geo Chart.

method.name: _showhistogramchart
method.comment: Generate and display the Histogram Chart.

method.name: _showpiechart
method.comment: Generate and display the Pie Chart.

method.name: _showscatterchart
method.comment: Generate and display the Scatter Chart.
